title._content: [Unidentified soldier in Confederate second lieutenant cavalry uniform with sheathed cavalry sword] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified soldier in Confederate second lieutenant cavalry uniform with sheathed cavalry sword] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate tintype, hand-colored ; 9.5 x 8.5 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: (front) Berg, no. 3-188; (back) Berg, no. 1-55. Photograph shows hand-colored gold piping indicating cavalry. Gift; Tom Liljenquist; 2010; (DLC/PP-2010:105). Published in: Serrano, D. A. Still more Confederate faces. Bayside, N.Y.: Metropolitan Company, 1992, p. 166. Subjects: Confederate States of America.--Army--People--1860-1870. Soldiers--Confederate--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Confederate--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Confederate. Format: Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Tintypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.27163 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2310
